Text editing filter

This filter will take a long bit of HTML and strip the formatting and print the first N characters.

Text editing directive

A directive that makes a text string editable.

This directive has an external dependency on TinyMCE with the fullscreen, link and textcolor plugins.



The directive will broadcast a message when the edit starts and when it finishes so that your controllers and models can handle the edit properly.
